file_content.text: Can't afford to leave the planet after paying for your help. Guess I'll be looking for work.
You tagged that screaming idiot, huh? Only a matter of time before the Sith pounce on him.
It's not gonna be pretty. Doesn't bother you, getting that guy killed?
Why should I care about an insignificant fool like him?
He was nothing.
Everybody's somebody, right? Poor scum probably has a family.
I'm sure he's guilty of some crime, somewhere.
No one's innocent.
You've got a dark way of looking at the world.
There are always casualties. It's not my concern.
People die all the time.
I wish I could be that cold-blooded.
Anybody that loud and dumb is bound to get fried eventually.
He had a big mouth.
I suppose so, it's just a nasty way to go.
Leave my feelings out of this.
No point second-guessing what's already done, huh? I can see that.
I'm not the one killing him.
I try to tell myself the same thing about those other victims.
I'm not happy, but it was either him or me. He shoulda kept his mouth shut.
Here, this is every credit I have. Thanks for the help.
My clients already ambushed one of the acolytes you tagged. Wish I coulda been there.
Attacking Sith is a major crime--even for other Sith. I sent the authorities an anonymous tip to watch the acolytes closely.
When my clients jumped the ones you tagged, they were arrested and executed. Best work I've done in a long time.
Those murderers were not true Sith. They deserved death.
They dishonored my order.
You won't hear me arguing.
Quite the little mastermind, aren't you?
You were very clever.
I'm just glad that acolyte wasn't hurt. Got enough blood on my hands, as it is.
Ever consider a career in intelligence work?
You'd make a fine spy.
And give up all this excitement? No thanks.
I wouldn't make a habit of killing your bosses, if I was you.
You killed your employers.
From now on, I'll be a lot choosier about my clients.
Good for you.
In this job, I don't get much chance to feel like I did the right thing.
Me, too.
Glad we could work together on this--'cause I sure didn't want to fight you.
My loudmouth friend oughta shut up, now that the killers have been caught. That should make life easier.
Here, take these credits. Couldn't have pulled this off without you. See you around, friend....
Hurry up and tag that loudmouth who keeps following me. I want this over with.
Go tag some Sith acolytes around the city. Doesn't matter who they are.
Listen, I didn't murder anybody. I was just hired to tag some random citizens. That's all.
You didn't ask why you were hired to tag random people?
Pretty strange job.
You know this business--if the credits are good, no questions asked. I didn't know my clients would kill those people.
I got instructions, not explanations. Seemed harmless at the time. I had no idea my clients would kill those people.
You admit you're mixed up in these brutal murders, then.
Sounds like a confession.
No! I never touched any of those victims. My clients did all the killings.
A likely story.
I admit, I've killed plenty in my time, but I never murdered anybody.
I was hired by a group of Sith to organize "games" for them. Didn't realize what that meant until bodies started piling up.
When I confronted them, they laughed. Said Sith have a birthright to hunt "lowlifes." It's like a sport to them.
I'd rather face an armed and dangerous foe.
Hardly sounds challenging.
A battle without honor is no battle at all. Glad somebody still understands that.
My Sith brethren obviously have too much time on their hands.
They must be bored.
I can think of better ways to pass the time, but then I'm not Sith.
There's no telling what will give a Sith pleasure.
Don't act so shocked.
And that's why I'm trying to get as far away from Dromund Kaas as possible.
I guess that's one way to sharpen your killer instincts.
We all need practice.
Where's the challenge in hunting a repair tech or waste disposal expert?
Disgusting and stupid.
Sooner or later, there'll be a witness to one of these killings. I don't wanna be around when that happens.
This is an odd turn of events.
I'm not taking the blame for something I didn't do.
I'm in over my head. And too many people are watching me now, so I can't even leave.
I need help, and I'm willing to pay for it. You interested?
Tell me what I can do for you.
Of course.
I'll do what I can.
Don't drag me into your mess. Clean it up yourself.
No.
You know how the Empire looks at us. We've gotta stick together.
There's no risk to you, I swear. No way this will come back on you.
I'm holding you to that promise. Tell me the plan.
It better not.
Stop begging--I'll do it.
I just want this problem to go away, and I only see two ways for that to happen.
Either get rid of the loudmouth pointing fingers at me, or end that sick "game" the Sith are playing.
I'll eliminate the man who sent me. Never liked him anyway.
I'll kill your accuser.
Poor scum. Shoulda minded his own business.
Take this hunter tag. Use it on that nosy scumbag. He'll become my clients' new target.
When you're done, come back here. I'll have your payment ready.
I think your clients need to find a new hobby.
I'll deal with the Sith.
Works for me. I have a plan that'll get them so good, no one will have to worry about fallout.
Take this hunter tag. Use it on Sith acolytes all around the city. The acolytes will become my clients' new targets.
Don't worry, I'll make sure they survive. Come back when you're done and I'll pay you.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
At least you know the truth. I'm no killer.
I've got a shuttle to catch. You mind getting out of my way?
Fleeing the scene of your crimes, Renegin?
In a hurry to leave?
Just my luck. Ten seconds later and I woulda been off this blasted planet....
You've been a bad boy, Renegin. Murdering innocent citizens? Tsk, tsk.
Actually, I do.
Now hold on. I never killed anybody who didn't have it coming.
You've been found guilty of murder, Renegin. Any last words?
I'm your executioner.
Hang on! I haven't murdered anybody--at least not the people you think I killed.
You've been listening to Wrightsyn. Great.
What are you looking at?
